properties.description: flux pour le retraitmenet des ecoulements du modele dsc-tereva

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque as string,
		Client as string,
		{code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Clé} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Mois_Selection as string,
		Code_depot as string,
		Depot as string,
		NoFrs as string,
		FOUR2 as string,
		C_Four as string,
		Lib_Four as string,
		Categorie as string,
		Canal as string,
		Financement as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		Date_Debut as string,
		Date_Fin as string,
		NoArtDSC as string,
		LibArt as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		{LIB AGENCE} as string,
		{Qté_Ini} as string,
		Solde_Qte as string,
		Qte_Tot as string,
		Qte_Retenue as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		NomCli as string,
		PRR as string,
		PRS_ligne_BL as string,
		PA_Ref as string,
		PA_D as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Ecart as string,
		Aide as string,
		Aide_Retenue as string,
		{Aide_Validée_VGF} as string,
		Date_Num as string,
		P_Fact as string,
		{Clé_Offre_Article} as string,
		Motif_Commentaire as string,
		{Qté_Campagne} as string,
		Prix_Campagne as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		Montant_Avoir as string,
		NoDocRefac as string,
		NoLigneDocRefac as string,
		{Contrôle} as string,
		Date_Ctrl as string,
		Code_Motif_Refus as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		{ValidéPar} as string,
		DateAjout as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> avoir
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> salerDSC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrgaTerevas
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filterColumnsToUse
EccAddToReplicate split(in(["dsc",'tereva'],lower(distributeur)),
	disjoint: false) ~> filterDistrubitor@(dscTereva, notDscTereva)
filterColumnsToUse derive(toreplicate = abs( toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF ) )) ~> AvoirAddToReplicate
Select1 derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger( qte_ecoulement )),
		agence_code = replace(agence_code, ".0", "")) ~> EccAddToReplicate
DerivedColumn1 split(in(["2","7"], CompanyId),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DscTerevaAvoir, NotDscTerevaAvoir)
salerDSC, OrgaTerevas union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		HubSAPid = last(HubSAPid)) ~> uniqueAgenceCode
AvoirAddToReplicate derive(ca_avoir = toFloat(PA_Valide_VGF),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+Mois  ),
		Qte_Validee_VGF = toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF )) ~> DerivedColumn1
ReSelect, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DscTerevaJoinOrganisation
ConditionalSplit1@DscTerevaAvoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReSelect
DscTerevaJoinOrganisation filter(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0) ~> positiveQuantite
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index),
		rcount = 1) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		dd,
		rcount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 window(over(year,
		agence_code,
		reference),
	asc(year, true),
	asc(agence_code, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 window(over(yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window2
positiveQuantite derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn6
Flatten3 window(over(year = {Année},
		Agence,
		NoArtVGF),
	asc({Année}, true),
	asc(Agence, true),
	asc(NoArtVGF, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window3
DerivedColumn6 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		{Année},
		Mois_Selection,
		Mois,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		yearmonth,
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_avoir,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Window3 derive(indexcols2 = {Année}+Agence+NoArtVGF+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_avoir = iif(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn7
Window2 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn8
Select4 derive(indexcols2 = year+agence_code+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn9
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva filter(lower(distributeur)=="tereva") ~> Filter1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		rcount,
		indexcols2,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
DerivedColumn9 derive(ca_ecoulement = abs(toDouble(ca_ecoulement))*qte_ecc) ~> DerivedColumn10
DerivedColumn7 derive(ca_avoir = abs(ca_avoir)*qte_avoir) ~> DerivedColumn11
ReSelect, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrganisation
JoinOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> Filter2
Filter2 filter({Année}=="2020"&&CompanyId=="7") ~> Filter3
Filter3 aggregate(Qte_Validee_VGF = sum(Qte_Validee_VGF)) ~> Aggregate1
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outEccDscTereva.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outEccDscTereva
positiveQuantite sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DscAvoirTemp.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DTAvoirRetraiter
DerivedColumn10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AZ_OecoulementDscTerevaWithIndex.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outEcoulementDScTereva
DerivedColumn8 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AZ_OecoulementPartedislikeWithIndex.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputEcoulementPartedis
DerivedColumn11 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AZ_AvoirWithIndexDSClike.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputAvoirDSc
ConditionalSplit1@NotDscTerevaAvoir sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AvoirForVanMarkes.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AvoirForVanMarkes
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['avoir.organisationNotFound.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputAvoirNotFound
